snippet: Social media emphasize the here and now. But some new services comb through your digital history to send daily reminders of your previous postings — happy or otherwise.
abstract: Jenna Wortham Bits blog; new apps like Timehop and Rewind.me tap into a user's social media history, sending them daily reminders of photos and past postings.
lead_paragraph: Social media emphasize the here and now. But some new services comb through your digital history to send daily reminders of your previous postings — happy or otherwise.

headline.seo: New Apps Recall the Details of Your Online Past
headline.main: This Is Your Life, as Recalled by an App
headline.print_headline: This Is Your Life (Recalled By an App)
